name: Rivet Games Discussion Forums
description:
Community forums for discussion of Rivet Games and related products.

You will need to create an account at forums.rivet-games.com in order to use this app.

This app enables you to:
- Access and post to the most recent forum discussions
- Read and post to blogs and articles
- Send and receive PM's
- View profiles of other forum users
- Customize your mobile account anywhere, anytime

Rivet Games is a team of passionate and talented artists and developers based in Stirling, Scotland. Building on years of prior experience of developing the highest quality routes and models for the Train Simulator products, the team have a passion for ensuring everything they do is accurate, build to the highest possible standards, and above all, is fun and enjoyable!
